summary: This mod tries to add a bit more of realism and a challenge to Skyrim. This mod makes every weapon in the game deal a one-hit kill. That means every player, follower, NPC, and enemy weapon will kill instantly.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]1Iei8FIIRJo[/youtube]


This mod tries to add a bit more of challenge to the combat in Skyrim. This mod makes every weapon in the game deal a one-hit kill. That means every player, follower, NPC, and enemy weapon will kill instantly.

This mod adds an extra challenge to the game, because no longer can you charge right into a fight. You must be aware of your surroundings, stealthy, and even fast with a bow and arrow. Proceed with caution around every corner ! Remember that your weapons AND enemy weapons kill instantly, so plan accordingly.

Note that this mod does produce a lot of killcam moves. I recommend the mod Killmove Control to reduce the amount of killcams or to stop them altogether. That mod can be found at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13446/?



Mod by Randall Herman
www.RandallHerman.com
author: Randall Herman
